xml.brief: Query the status of geocache reports

desc.p: This method queries the status of one or more geocache reports that were submitted trough services/caches/reports/submit.

returns.p: A dictionary. The report IDs that you provide will be mapped to dictionary keys. Each value will be either null if there is no report with this ID, or one of these strings:

ul.li: Open - the report is either waiting to be processed, or someone is working on it.
Closed - the report has been closed.
